actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: Resolution requesting the Secretary of Agriculture to rescind the food stamp regulations proposed on December 6, 1974.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to immediately rescind the food stamp regulations proposed on December 6, 1974, and take all necessary steps to insure that the Nation's elderly and poor will continue to benefit from the food stamp program to the extent which they presently do.

titles.title: Resolution requesting the Secretary of Agriculture to rescind the food stamp regulations proposed on December 6, 1974.
